# 'branch merge' fails when run from trunk.

as 'Test <test@example.com>'
at '2024-04-05T16:40:32Z'

# setup
cd repo
git init
git commit --allow-empty -m 'Initial commit'

# set up a fake GitHub remote
shamhub init
shamhub new origin alice/example.git
shamhub register alice
git push origin main

env SHAMHUB_USERNAME=alice
gs auth login

# create a branch and submit it
git add feature1.txt
gs bc feature1 -m 'Add feature 1'
gs bs --fill
stderr 'Created #1'

# switch to trunk
gs trunk

# branch merge from trunk should fail
! gs branch merge
stderr 'cannot merge trunk'

-- repo/feature1.txt --
This is feature 1
